subject: Waterproof Ghost Box  - for investigations in the rain or a wet area
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Have you ever been called out to investigate paranormal activity 
happening in a shower, only when the water is running?
Or maybe to an area where it happens only when it rains. Don't you wish 
you could have taken your ghost box out there with you, but were afraid 
it would get all wet and ruin the sensitive electronic circuitry?
Well... worry no more. Now you can take ghost box functionality with 
you when you're all wet, or at least the environment you're in is all 
wet. Now you can listen to those ghosts, singing in the shower.. :-)

Here's a video that shows you how to make a waterprroof SONY ICF-S79V 
into a ghost box with non-stop sweeping audio.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mmSjEug601Q

- Mike Coletta (UFO Geek)
